timeline.message:
CorfuStoreBrowser: fix RegistryTable printTable bug

RegistryTable is a system table that does not need the
DynamicProtobufSerializer, so the printTable must handle
this differently otherwiser it will hit this exception
ava.lang.ClassCastException:
org.corfudb.runtime.CorfuStoreMetadata$TableName cannot be cast to
org.corfudb.runtime.collections.CorfuDynamicKey
CorfuStore: Fix corfu_options error in DynamicProtobufSerializer

timeline.bodyText: maybe add a todo to find the real issue for the truncation?
timeline.author: optimol

replies.bodyText: people beat me up if I add TODO in my code :(
replies.author: hisundar

timeline.bodyText: we're doing the same thing in the compactor, can the same issue happen there (We first do a runtime.getTableRegistry there, and then again open it with the dynamic serializer)? Because then we can work around it for now, until the scoping fix is in.
timeline.author: optimol
